Electric fans, electric fans, as the name suggests, have to have electricity, Traditional fans always follow a long tail, and once the power goes out, Can't be used. This fan is different. Two modes of charging and plugging in. It can be used as usual when power is off.  Rely on it. Coupled with the folding function design, it can be used for picnics and camping.


This is a very nice Electric fan. It can bend, stretch, and fold. When you push it up, it turns into a table fan. It can be used on dining tables, bedside tables, and desks. And it also has a flexible telescopic pole, which can be elongated by pulling it upwards, and instantly transforms into a floor fan, which can be switched at will according to the use scene. At the same time, it can be folded up. After the whole folding, it is as big as a small washbasin. When autumn and summer pass, it is very convenient to store it. You can put it into a bag or cabinet and let it lie down in "hibernation".
